reference.shortdesc: The refbody element is a container for the main content of the reference topic. Reference topics limit the body structure to tables (both simple and standard), property lists, syntax sections, and generic sections and examples, in any sequence or number.

section.title: Usage information
section.p: Reference topics represent the kind of information that users typically consult to understand programming objects, configuration file options, recipes, terminological descriptions, product or other specifications, equipment or parts lists, or any other set of factual information.

section.title: Specialization hierarchy
section.p: The refbody element is specialized from the body element in the topic module.
